shapes3d.animation
Class OrbitCam

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.animation.Camera
      shapes3d.animation.OrbitCam

public class OrbitCam
extends Camera

A very basic camera that can orbit a particular position in 3D space as specified by the lookAt vector.

Author:
Peter Lager
